channel.title: Homebrew on kyoh86.work
channel.description: Recent content in Homebrew on kyoh86.work

item.title: Homebrewでインストールしまくったあいつらの正体を知りに行く
item.description: 結論 brew list | grep -v '^lib' | while read line; do echo -n ${line}$'\t' brew info $line | grep -P '^https?://' | head -n1 done | column -t -s $'\t' > brew-list.txtatk https://library.gnome.org/devel/atk/ autoconf https://www.gnu.org/software/autoconf automake https://www.gnu.org/software/automake/ autotrace http://autotrace.sourceforge.net awscli https://aws.amazon.com/cli/ : そこそこ便利。 背景 Homebrewは、OSX界じゃあ
